divs: sighting detailsstaying at the downtown spokane comfort in aug. 8th at around midnight i was having. a smoke while watching what i thought to be 2 stars twinkling to the south. without warning the star i was focusing on rapidly ascended to nearly above me but still out in front, i thought immediately i might be witnessing a ufo due to the rapid acceleration\ apparennt large distance covered. i then thought to myself "i wish i could see a sign that this is. truly something extraordinary" no sonnet had this thought crossed my mind when one after another the two nearest street lamps to me flickered off one after another. this stunned me and i continued to observe this "star". after the object eclipsed the top of the hotel behind me out of view the two lamps flickered back on in the opposite order than when they went out. i was left with a very strong feeling that i was being contacted and the street light annomoly was an artifact to prove the existence of what i was witnessing. very strange indeed
trends: There have been 41 other sightings in Spokane
There were 2 other sightings in Spokane on or around August 8th 2012
Summary: Star like sighting that turned off street lamps in conjunction with thoughts
